title: Can we address how frustrating it is to play against Trundle?
body:
The guy's tanky, very slippery with his pillar, frozen domain and Q's slow as well as being able to make you his bitch simply by pressing R.
To top it all off if something around him dies, allies included, he gets free health back. It's really obnoxious...

It's what happens when you create an immobile champion with limited burst, no pulls and no dashes - their kit is amped up to compensate so that they can still compete in 5v5s, but at the same time it makes them virtually invincible when placed against another Melee champion. 
Used to be the case with Shyvanna too, she could outlane and outdamage pretty much everyone, but then she took an arrow to the knee - too much sticking potential with ult, burnout and BOTRK.
Now it's Trundle and Voli - Trundles AD steal, AS, and insane sustain makes him very hard to beat in Lane.
Voli's passive makes all-ins against him very dangerous to the point that you simply cannot 1v1 him unless you're significantly better and have a champion with outplay potential, or unless you have a significant item lead.

I'd understand if you'd rather fight him than Gnar's obnoxious poke, kiting and extreme CC, but Fiora? Really? Tank Fiora was nerfed, she now has to build alot of damage meaning that she easily dies, she doesn't have a good way to quickly and unpredictably engage a teamfight and dies instantly if she doesn't parry all of your shit with one W, and if your whole team threw all of your spells at a Fiora at the same time, I'm sorry, but you deserved to lose that fight. In the early game her W also has a rather long cooldown and is quite easy to play around if you have even a single dash/blink ability and unless you're in really high ELO it's rather easy to bait it out. She is generally considered a skill-matchup vs damage dealers these days and a counter to tanks.

Meanwhile Trundle is literally impossible to trade against if you're a melee toplaner in the early game because of his Q decreasing your AD whilst increasing his own by twice the amount, I've had games where he's rushed sunfire and still has more AD than me when I'm building damage because I lose 20 AD and he gains 40 whenever he uses his level 5 Q on me. Ontop of that, the cooldown on the ability is only 4 seconds at all ranks and lasts for 8 seconds and costs only 30 mana, meaning that he can easily have himself buffed and you debuffed at all times. He also gets free literal shit tons of sustain straight out of his arse from his passive which instantly heals him for 2/3/4/5/6% of his max health whenever a unit _**dies, no effort required**_ within a 1400 units range (to give you a perspective of approximately how far this is, Twisted Fate's Q range is 1450). This is just an absurd amount of sustain. His ultimate is also extremely problematic, because it punishes your team for even having a tank, which is just completely retarded.
hes literally no different than any other tanky top laner.
